author: LondoW
text:
Sometimes even getting out of bed is a challenge and at tyms I get random flashbacks (they stop me in my tracks), no matter what I'm doing.
I can't even walk alone anymore, any and everything startles me.
 #DepressionIsReal

author: LondoW
text: Its crazy how ppl act like they living the life wen in reality they are living a lie
